name: Ward Ally
description: Call on your staff's strength to protect you and the lowest health ally around you with a damage shield that absorbs 2323 damage.  The shield's strength is increased by up to 100%, depending on the severity of the target's wounds.
effectLines: Cast two shields instead of one, with one shield always on yourself. Reduces the cost as the ability ranks up.
coefDescription: Call on your staff's strength to protect you and the lowest health ally around you with a damage shield that absorbs $1 damage.  The shield's strength is increased by up to 100%, depending on the severity of the target's wounds.
rawDescription:
Call on your staff's strength to protect you and the lowest health ally around you with a damage shield that absorbs <<1>> damage.

The shield's strength is increased by up to <<2>>%, depending on the severity of the target's wounds.
